Steve DeGregorio
================

Steve DeGregorio, Councilor, District 2
---------------------------------------

Term Ends: May 2026
[Email Steve DeGregorio](mailto:sdegregorio@rosenbergtx.gov)
City Hall: 832-595-3340

Steve DeGregorio was first elected to Rosenberg City Council District 2 in 2018 and again in a runoff election on June 15, 2024.
